import { useState } from "react"; import toast from "react-hot-toast"; import axios from "../../utils/axios"; import PublicLayout from "../../components/layout/PublicLayout"; /** * Upload file to AWS S3 using presigned URL */ const uploadToS3 = async (file, folder) => { const { data } = await axios.get( `/s3/presigned-url?fileType=${encodeURIComponent( file.type )}&folder=${encodeURIComponent(folder)}` ); const res = await fetch(data.uploadUrl, { method: "PUT", body: file, // no extra headers }); if (!res.ok) { throw new Error("S3 upload failed"); } return data.fileUrl; }; const ModelRegister = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", stageName: "", gender: "Female", dateOfBirth: "", email: "", phone: "", country: "", state: "", city: "", heightCm: "", weightKg: "", bustCm: "", waistCm: "", hipsCm: "", chestCm: "", shoeSize: "", eyeColor: "", hairColor: "", skinTone: "", bodyType: "Average", tattoos: false, piercings: false, experienceLevel: "Beginner", languages: "", skills: "", availableFor: "", travelWillingness: "Yes", expectedPayPerDay: "", }); const [profileImage, setProfileImage] = useState(null); const [portfolioImages, setPortfolioImages] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const handleProfileImage = (e) => { setProfileImage(e.target.files[0]); }; const handlePortfolioImages = (e) => { setPortfolioImages(Array.from(e.target.files)); }; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setForm((p) => ({ ...p, [name]: type === "checkbox" ? checked : value, })); }; const submit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { setLoading(true); let profileImageUrl = ""; let portfolioUrls = []; if (profileImage) { profileImageUrl = await uploadToS3(profileImage, "models/profile"); } for (const img of portfolioImages) { const url = await uploadToS3(img, "models/portfolio"); portfolioUrls.push(url); } const payload = { ...form, languages: form.languages ? form.languages.split(",").map((l) => l.trim()) : [], skills: form.skills ? form.skills.split(",").map((s) => s.trim()) : [], availableFor: form.availableFor ? form.availableFor.split(",").map((a) => a.trim()) : [], profileImage: profileImageUrl, portfolio: portfolioUrls, }; await axios.post("/models/register", payload); toast.success("Profile submitted. Await admin approval."); } catch (err) { toast.error(err.response?.data?.message || "Registration failed"); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; return (
